item.title: BH help?

item.description:
@nigelthechamp wrote:

public void setTarget() {
clearQuestInterface();
for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.maxPlayers; i++) {
if(server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { {
int playerTar = playerId;
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[playerTar];
targetPlayer = server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName;
}
}
}
}

this is what i have… but it only makes one target for everyone.

anyone able to help?
